content.rendered:
[vc_row type=”container”][vc_column width=”1/2″][vc_column_text]KN95 Masks are widely recommended for the protection of healthcare workers who come in direct contact with patients with Coronavirus and other airborne viruses.

  • Filters at least 95% of very small (0.3 micron) airborne particles
  • High filtering ability, low resistance, easy breathability
  • Glue-free and odorless
  • Soft, flexible, and adjustable nose bridge
  • More cost-effective than N95 masks

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/2″][vc_gallery type=”flexslider_slide” interval=”3″ images=”73897,73867″ img_size=”400×267″ css=”.vc_custom_1592583218545{padding-top: 0px !important;}”][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row type=”container”][vc_column][vc_separator color=”#e5e5e5″ type=”normal” thickness=”1″ up=”” down=””][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row type=”container”][vc_column][vc_column_text]

KN95 Mask

[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text]While single layer nuisance dust masks can help keep you safe during light construction or cleaning activities, they offer little protection against very small particles traveling through the air, like germs from a cough or sneeze, or fine non-poisonous dusts. For protection against small particles, a mask with filtration material and a particulate respirator is often required. Currently, the most widely used and marketed particulate respirators are KN95 masks. These masks have a 95% efficiency rating, and can filter particles of 0.3 microns.

TTI Medical’s KN95 Respirator masks conform to most stringent standards. Our Disposable KN95 masks provide protection against non-oil-based particles such as those resulting from wildfires, PM 2.5 air pollution, volcanic eruptions, or bioaerosols (e.g. viruses). They are extremely durable, have a soft and comfortable inner surface, an adjustable nose piece and secure head straps to provide proper fit.

Part # 203-002[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row type=”container”][vc_column][vc_tta_tabs color=”white” active_section=”1″][vc_tta_section title=”Regulatory” tab_id=”1569386751419-a33a2db6-6e3dc035-e168198f-9494″][vc_column_text]Our KN95 masks conform to the GB2626-2006 standard.

TTI Medical is registered with the FDA and ISO 13485:2016 certified.[/vc_column_text][/vc_tta_section][/vc_tta_tabs][/vc_column][/vc_row]
